imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Clean category image showing curated combo gift sets (gift hamper/assortment) on a neutral background (category-combo-gift-sets.dim_800x600.png)

existing_features.title: Add and serve a new static category image for the “Combo Gift Sets” card so that the card shows the image instead of the SafeImage fallback UI in the CuratedCategoriesSection. This must affect only the selected card image area/fallback elements (the SafeImage fallback container and its SVG) within the Curated Gift Categories section.

projectName: Add Combo Gift Sets category image to curated categories section
